templateOptions.label: Set department in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note: We can only set departments that already exist in Zenya, and all departments must have unique names (matching is by name only). Department maintenance (creation, deletion, setting the owner) must be done in Zenya.

templateOptions.label: Set manager in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note: We can only assign a manager who exists in Zenya and was created by HelloID. HelloID must first grant the Account entitlement to the manager.
